title: How to bring Rek'sai back into play without making her OP
body:
Currently Rek'sai is not played at all and when she is her win rate is abysmal. 

Change her Passive to: While Burrowed, Rek'sai heals for (1% + 1% per 100 tAD) of her max HP consuming 25% of her max Rage per second for up to 4 seconds. 

Add to her W un-burrow: Knockup prioritizes champions.  This would add back her skill expression to the knockup.

Add to her E Burrowed: Rek'asi is untargetable while inside a tunnel. This would allow her to dive and make her a bit more slippery.  Also add skill expression to her play.

replies.body:
1. Give her back her old ult if she is below 100 Fury.

2. Make her able to activate her new ult at 100 Fury only.

3. Make the old ult give her 100 Fury upon arrival.
Riot didnt like the Pro play her global ult gave.  Its part of why she was pick or ban ins S5? 6?
These changes would really help her out and I dont think would be over buffing.
Oh and make it so her point and Click Ult CAN NOT BE DODGED FFS
She can do pretty well in the top lane, especially against champs like Irelia. With DH, at least.

On the PBE I have been playing her Top lane with the changes to Death Dance and a lot of people seem to have forgotten how she works.   Its why I made this post because she really needs these little tweaks to match up with the current standard of a fighter/diver.
